name: VR - Crazy Car Racer: Traffic Racing Free
name_original: VR - Crazy Car Racer: Traffic Racing Free
description:
Welcome to the world of real racing champion and polish your driving skills incredibly by wearing vr glasses and become the participant of world champion racing league.
VR Crazy traffic race is a real car racing game which gives you a real navigation of speed thrill with true effects of virtual reality and take you in real surrounding of speed racer with smooth drifting and multiple racing mode. So get ready to test our driving features and grab a pro version today when you find a realistic speed thrill and tons of luxury cars to drive with clipboard glasses.

Features:
Realistic control.
Smooth graphics with vr effects.
Multiple views and surroundings.
Loads of cruiser to drive.
Various racing modes.
Real traffic rush.
